entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:25 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:25 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 70%
